quote: All truly great thoughts are conceived while walking.
Everywhere is walking distance if you have the time.
If I could not walk far and fast, I think I should just explode and perish.
Home is everything you can walk to.
It is good to collect things, but it is better to go on walks.
Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
Walking is man's best medicine.
My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.
There comes... a longing never to travel again except on foot.
In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
One may walk over the highest mountain one step at a time.
I'm a slow walker, but I never walk back.
If you are seeking creative ideas, go out walking. Angels whisper to a man when he goes for a walk.
A vigorous five-mile walk will do more good for an unhappy but otherwise healthy adult than all the medicine and psychology in the world.
My father considered a walk among the mountains as the equivalent of churchgoing.
Thoughts come clearly while one walks.
Your body is built for walking.
In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk.
We live in a fast-paced society. Walking slows us down.
Some people like surrounding themselves with beautiful objects, furniture, and art. A walk outside is a better value.
